Package orion

Class Orion

  • java.lang.Object
    • orion.Orion
  • public class Orion
extends java.lang.Object
    Orion implements all NGSIv2 operations by using objects java.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Orion()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Object batchNotify​(java.lang.Object entities)
      This operation is intended to consume a notification payload so that all the entity data included by such notification is persisted, overwriting if necessary.
      java.lang.Object batchQuery​(java.lang.Object entities)
      The response is an Array containing one object per matching entity, or an empty array [] if no entities are found.
      void batchUpdate​(java.lang.Object entities)
      This operation allows to create, update and/or delete several entities in a single batch operation.
      void createEntity​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Create a entity on Orion (require a IP + port from Orion Context Broker)
      void createRegistration​(java.lang.Object registration)
      this operation creates a new context provider registration.
      void createSubscriptions​(java.lang.Object subscription)
      this operation creates a new subscription on Orion.
      void deleteRegistration​(java.lang.String registrationId)
      this operation delete the Registration given your registrationId
      void deleteSubscription​(java.lang.String subscriptionId)
      this operation cancels subscription given a subscriptionId.
      java.lang.Object getAttributeData​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.String attrName, java.lang.Object obj)
      Return the object with the attribute data of the attribute.
      java.lang.Object getAttributeValue​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.String attrName)
      Returns the value property with the value of the attribute.
      void listEntities​(java.lang.String criteria)
      Retrieves a list of entities that match different criteria
      java.lang.Object listEntityTypes()
      this operation return the entity types from Orion.
      void listRegistrations()
      this operation lists all the context provider registrations present in the system.
      java.lang.Object listSubscriptions()
      this operation returns a list of all the subscriptions present in the system.
      void removeEntity​(java.lang.String entityId)
      Delete the entity given id of the entity.
      void removeSingleAttribute​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.String attrName)
      Removes an entity attribute.
      void replaceAllEntitiesAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.Object obj)
      Replace attributes for the entity, given your id and object representing the new attributes.
      java.lang.Object retrieveEntity​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.Object obj)
      Given an Id and object that represents the entity required, returns an object updated from Orion.
      java.lang.Object retrieveEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.Object obj)
      similar to retrieve the whole entity. this operation must return only one entity element.
      java.lang.String retrieveEntityType​(java.lang.String entitytype)
      this operation return information about entity types from Orion.
      java.lang.Object retrieveRegistration​(java.lang.String registrationId)
      this operation return the Registration given your registrationId
      java.lang.Object retrieveSubscription​(java.lang.String subscriptionId)
      this operation returns a subscription given the subscriptionId
      void updateAttributeData​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.String attrName, java.lang.Object obj)
      Replace previous attribute data by the one in the object.
      void updateAttributeValue​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.String attrName, java.lang.Object obj)
      given a object representing a new attribute, this operation turn it a new attribute value.
      void updateExistingEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.Object obj)
      The entity attributes are updated with the ones in the object.
      void updateOrAppendEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId, java.lang.Object obj)
      the entity attributes are updated (if they previously exist) or appended (if they don’t previously exist) with the ones in the payload.
      void updateRegistration​(java.lang.String registrationId, java.lang.Object registration)
      this operation delete the Registration given your registrationId
      void updateSubscription​(java.lang.String subscriptionId, java.lang.Object subscription)
      this operation update the subscription (Only the fields included in the request are updated in the subscription)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Orion

        public Orion()

    • Method Detail

      • createEntity

        public void createEntity​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Create a entity on Orion (require a IP + port from Orion Context Broker)
        Parameters:
        obj - An given object representing the entity. The object follows the JSON entity representation format (described in a “JSON Entity Representation” section) on NGSIv2 docs.

      • listEntities

        public void listEntities​(java.lang.String criteria)
        Retrieves a list of entities that match different criteria
        Parameters:
        criteria - An given object representing the entity. The object follows the JSON entity representation format (described in a “JSON Entity Representation” section) on NGSIv2 docs.

      • retrieveEntity

        public java.lang.Object retrieveEntity​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                       java.lang.Object obj)
        Given an Id and object that represents the entity required, returns an object updated from Orion.
        Parameters:
        entityId - an identifier from entity
        obj - the object that represents the entity
        Returns:
        a object updated from entity

      • removeEntity

        public void removeEntity​(java.lang.String entityId)
        Delete the entity given id of the entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be deleted.

      • retrieveEntityAttributes

        public java.lang.Object retrieveEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                                 java.lang.Object obj)
        similar to retrieve the whole entity. this operation must return only one entity element.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a object representing the entity
        See Also:
        retrieveEntity(String, Object)

      • replaceAllEntitiesAttributes

        public void replaceAllEntitiesAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                         java.lang.Object obj)
        Replace attributes for the entity, given your id and object representing the new attributes. Change id and type for entity is not allowed.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        obj - object representing the new attributes for the entity.

      • updateOrAppendEntityAttributes

        public void updateOrAppendEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                           java.lang.Object obj)
        the entity attributes are updated (if they previously exist) or appended (if they don’t previously exist) with the ones in the payload.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        obj - object representing the attributes to append or update

      • updateExistingEntityAttributes

        public void updateExistingEntityAttributes​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                           java.lang.Object obj)
        The entity attributes are updated with the ones in the object.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        obj - an object representing the attributes to update.

      • getAttributeData

        public java.lang.Object getAttributeData​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                         java.lang.String attrName,
                                         java.lang.Object obj)
        Return the object with the attribute data of the attribute.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        attrName - Name of the attribute to be retrieved.
        obj - object that represents the attribute
        Returns:
        a object with the attribute data of the attribute.

      • updateAttributeData

        public void updateAttributeData​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                java.lang.String attrName,
                                java.lang.Object obj)
        Replace previous attribute data by the one in the object.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        attrName - Name of the attribute to be retrieved.
        obj - object that represents the attribute to update.

      • removeSingleAttribute

        public void removeSingleAttribute​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                  java.lang.String attrName)
        Removes an entity attribute.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        attrName - Name of the attribute to be retrieved.

      • getAttributeValue

        public java.lang.Object getAttributeValue​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                          java.lang.String attrName)
        Returns the value property with the value of the attribute.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved.
        attrName - Name of the attribute to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        value of the given attribute.

      • updateAttributeValue

        public void updateAttributeValue​(java.lang.String entityId,
                                 java.lang.String attrName,
                                 java.lang.Object obj)
        given a object representing a new attribute, this operation turn it a new attribute value.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to be retrieved
        attrName - Name of the attribute to be retrieved.

        Returns:

      • listRegistrations

        this operation lists all the context provider registrations present in the system.

      • createRegistration

        public void createRegistration​(java.lang.Object registration)
        this operation creates a new context provider registration. Typically used for binding context sources as providers of certain data.
        Parameters:
        registration -

        Returns:

      • batchUpdate

        public void batchUpdate​(java.lang.Object entities)
        This operation allows to create, update and/or delete several entities in a single batch operation. Given the entities object that represents the entities
        Parameters:
        entities -

      • batchQuery

        public java.lang.Object batchQuery​(java.lang.Object entities)
